feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:50 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -22.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 10:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -22.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -29.8°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the evening and after midnight. Amount 20 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h in the evening then northwest 20 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
